global.styles: body{color:#eee}.site-header{background:#000}.site-header,.site-header .hamburger,.site-header a{color:#ddd}.site-header a:hover{color:#fff}.site-content{background:#222}#comments,.breadcrumb,.entry-article,.sidebar>.wrap{background:#000}p{color:#eee}.site-footer{background:#000}.site-footer,.site-footer p{color:#fff}.entry-meta li,a{color:#9cd7f7}a:hover{color:#dff3ff}.more-link:hover{color:#fff}.entry-title a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#ddd}input[type=email],input[type=number],input[type=password],input[type=search],input[type=tel],input[type=text],input[type=url],select,textarea{color:#eee;background:#000;border:1px solid #333}input[type=email]:focus,input[type=number]:focus,input[type=password]:focus,input[type=search]:focus,input[type=tel]:focus,input[type=text]:focus,input[type=url]:focus,select:focus,textarea:focus{background:#000}.button,.pagination li a,.pagination li span,button,input[type=button],input[type=reset],input[type=submit]{background:#000;color:#eee;border:1px solid #333}.button:hover,.pagination li a:hover,.pagination li span:hover,button:hover,input[type=button]:hover,input[type=reset]:hover,input[type=submit]:hover{color:#eee;background:#222}h1:hover,h2:hover,h3:hover,h4:hover,h5:hover,h6:hover{color:#fff}.entry-meta svg{fill:#eee}code{background:#333;color:#eee;border:1px solid #555}.header-section:not(.site-header){border-bottom:1px solid #000;background:#222;}

body{color:#4c5270;font-family:ABeeZee,sans-serif}.site-header{background:#f652a0}.site-header,.site-header .hamburger,.site-header a{color:#fff}.site-header a:hover{color:#4c5270}.site-content{background:#e9f1ef}#comments,.breadcrumb,.entry-article,.sidebar>.wrap{background:#fff}p{color:#4c5270}.site-footer{background:#4c5270}.site-footer,.site-footer p{color:#fff}.entry-meta li,a{color:#0b867d}a:hover{color:#36eee0}.entry-title a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#4c5270}input[type=email],input[type=number],input[type=password],input[type=search],input[type=tel],input[type=text],input[type=url],select,textarea{background:#e9f1ef;border:1px solid #e9f1ef}input[type=email]:focus,input[type=number]:focus,input[type=password]:focus,input[type=search]:focus,input[type=tel]:focus,input[type=text]:focus,input[type=url]:focus,select:focus,textarea:focus{background:#bcece0;border:1px solid #bcece0}.button,.pagination li a,.pagination li span,button,input[type=button],input[type=reset],input[type=submit]{background:#4c5270;color:#fff;border:1px solid #4c5270}.button:hover,.pagination li a:hover,.pagination li span:hover,button:hover,input[type=button]:hover,input[type=reset]:hover,input[type=submit]:hover{color:#eee;background:#f652a0}h1:hover,h2:hover,h3:hover,h4:hover,h5:hover,h6:hover{color:#4c5270}.entry-meta svg{fill:#0b867d}code{background:#bcece0;color:#4c5270;border:1px solid #0b867d}

body{color:#0c2d48;font-family:Source Serif Pro,serif;font-size:1.5rem}.site-header{background:#145da0}.site-header,.site-header .hamburger,.site-header a,.site-header h1{color:#fff}.site-header a:hover{color:#fff}.site-content{background:#ebf4f7;font-size:1.5rem}#comments,.breadcrumb,.entry-article,.sidebar>.wrap{background:#fff}p{color:#0c2d48;font-size:1.7rem}.site-footer{background:#0c2d48}.site-footer,.site-footer p{color:#fff}.entry-meta li,a{color:#145da0}a:hover{color:#2e8bc0}.entry-title a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#0c2d48}input[type=email],input[type=number],input[type=password],input[type=search],input[type=tel],input[type=text],input[type=url],select,textarea{background:#fff;border:1px solid #145da0}input[type=email]:focus,input[type=number]:focus,input[type=password]:focus,input[type=search]:focus,input[type=tel]:focus,input[type=text]:focus,input[type=url]:focus,select:focus,textarea:focus{background:#145da0}input[type=email]:placeholder,input[type=number]:placeholder,input[type=password]:placeholder,input[type=search]:placeholder,input[type=tel]:placeholder,input[type=text]:placeholder,input[type=url]:placeholder,select:placeholder,textarea:placeholder{color:#2e8bc0}.button,.pagination li a,.pagination li span,button,input[type=button],input[type=reset],input[type=submit]{background:#145da0;color:#eee;border:1px solid #145da0}.button:hover,.pagination li a:hover,.pagination li span:hover,button:hover,input[type=button]:hover,input[type=reset]:hover,input[type=submit]:hover{color:#eee;background:#0c2d48}.entry-meta svg{fill:#2e8bc0}code{background:#333;color:#eee;border:1px solid #555}.header-section:not(.site-header){background:#ebf4f7}

body{color:#fff;font-family:Montserrat,sans-serif}.header-section{background:#0c2d48}.header-section,.header-section .hamburger,.header-section a{color:#fff}.header-section a:hover{color:#fff}.site-content{background:#145da0}#comments,.breadcrumb,.entry-article,.sidebar>.wrap{background:#0c2d48}p{color:#fff}.site-footer{background:#0c2d48}.site-footer,.site-footer p{color:#fff}.entry-meta li,a{color:#b1d4e0}a:hover{color:#ebf4f7}.entry-title a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#fff}h1:hover,h2:hover,h3:hover,h4:hover,h5:hover,h6:hover{color:#ebf4f7}input[type=email],input[type=number],input[type=password],input[type=search],input[type=tel],input[type=text],input[type=url],select,textarea{background:#145da0;color:#ebf4f7;border:1px solid #145da0}input[type=email]:focus,input[type=number]:focus,input[type=password]:focus,input[type=search]:focus,input[type=tel]:focus,input[type=text]:focus,input[type=url]:focus,select:focus,textarea:focus{background:#145da0}input[type=email]:placeholder,input[type=number]:placeholder,input[type=password]:placeholder,input[type=search]:placeholder,input[type=tel]:placeholder,input[type=text]:placeholder,input[type=url]:placeholder,select:placeholder,textarea:placeholder{color:#145da0}.button,.pagination li a,.pagination li span,button,input[type=button],input[type=reset],input[type=submit]{background:#145da0;color:#ebf4f7;border:1px solid #145da0}.button:hover,.pagination li a:hover,.pagination li span:hover,button:hover,input[type=button]:hover,input[type=reset]:hover,input[type=submit]:hover{color:#eee;background:#2e8bc0;border:1px solid #2e8bc0}h1:hover,h2:hover,h3:hover,h4:hover,h5:hover,h6:hover{color:#145da0}.entry-meta svg{fill:#2e8bc0}code{background:#333;color:#eee;border:1px solid #555}input::placeholder{color:rgb(255,255,255,.6);}.more-link:hover{color:#fff}.header-section:not(.site-header){border: none;background: #0b2d48;}

body{color:#383838}.site-header{background:#e7d2cc}.site-header,.site-header .hamburger,.site-header a{color:#383838}.site-header a:hover{color:#000}.site-content{background:#eeede7;font-family:Roboto,sans-serif}#comments,.breadcrumb,.entry-article,.sidebar>.wrap{background:#eeede7;padding: 3em 0;}p{color:#383838}.site-footer{background:#868b8e}.site-footer,.site-footer p{color:#fff}.entry-meta li,a{color:#868b8e}a:hover{color:#383838}.entry-title a,h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6{color:#383838;font-family:Vollkorn,serif}h1:hover,h2:hover,h3:hover,h4:hover,h5:hover,h6:hover{color:#ebf4f7}input[type=email],input[type=number],input[type=password],input[type=search],input[type=tel],input[type=text],input[type=url],select,textarea{background:#b9b7bd;border:1px solid #b9b7bd}input[type=email]:focus,input[type=number]:focus,input[type=password]:focus,input[type=search]:focus,input[type=tel]:focus,input[type=text]:focus,input[type=url]:focus,select:focus,textarea:focus{background:#b9b7bd;border:1px solid #bcece0}input[type=email]:placeholder,input[type=number]:placeholder,input[type=password]:placeholder,input[type=search]:placeholder,input[type=tel]:placeholder,input[type=text]:placeholder,input[type=url]:placeholder,select:placeholder,textarea:placeholder{color:#b9b7bd}.button,.pagination li a,.pagination li span,button,input[type=button],input[type=reset],input[type=submit]{background:#b9b7bd;color:#383838;border:1px solid #b9b7bd}.button:hover,.pagination li a:hover,.pagination li span:hover,button:hover,input[type=button]:hover,input[type=reset]:hover,input[type=submit]:hover{color:#383838;background:#b9b7bd}h1:hover,h2:hover,h3:hover,h4:hover,h5:hover,h6:hover{color:#000}.entry-meta svg{fill:#2e8bc0}code{background:#333;color:#eee;border:1px solid #555}.header-section:not(.site-header){background:#eeede7;}
